name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior WebTest Engineer with over 13 years of experience in high-performance application development and testing, proficient in **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **React**. Adept in automation and testing frameworks including **Playwright** and **Selenium** to enhance project efficiency and reliability. Demonstrated expertise in backend technologies such as **Django**, **SQLAlchemy**, and **PostgreSQL**, alongside message broker solutions like **RabbitMQ** and task management with **Celery**.

Well-versed in deploying and managing cloud services on platforms like **Azure**, **GCP**, and **Heroku**, utilizing **Terraform**, **Helm**, and **k8s** for infrastructure as code and container orchestration. Strong advocate of Agile methodologies, promoting collaborative and iterative development processes. Background in building AI/ML-powered solutions with attention to MLOps, compliance standards (HIPAA, PCI DSS), and continuous integration/deployment practices with **GitHub Actions**.

Recognized for delivering quality-driven solutions that foster predictive analytics and real-time processing, ensuring project alignment with industry regulations and best practices.
